44.eng-name: The Book of the Merits of the Companions
44.ara-name: كتاب فضائل الصحابة رضى الله تعالى عنهم

hadiths.text: Anas reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) went to Umm Aiman and I went along with him and she served him a drink in a vessel and he reported that the narrator said:I do not know whether it was because of the fasting (or for any other reason) that he (the Holy Prophet) refused to accept that. She raised her voice and showed annoyance to him

chapter.ara-name: باب مِنْ فَضَائِلِ أُمِّ أَيْمَنَ رضى الله عنها
